text: Oh my god... it smells so bad. This might be
the grossest bathroom...
I've been in... In my entire life.

aren't you cold? God...
Talk to me how do you feel?

I feel like I'm talking like if I have anesthesia

above sea level.. I see what you me -- mean,  my mouth

So our guide Santos was saying that
this trek, this mountain, only really became
popular late 2015. So right now it's June
2016 and it's everywhere. There's posters
all over Cusco about the Rainbow Mountains.
I suspect... the posters have been
photoshopped a little bit.
Either way, it looks quite beautiful.

haha we finally made it to the rainbow mountains
3,2,1 teleport! Wow!
Guys Seriously... Jesus Christ look at this it is like a

Here we are at the summit. Chapped lips, Frozen hands...
It's beautiful though.
I was thinking that the pictures were photoshopped that we saw on
the posters. Not really... is pretty damn
beautiful. The red, yellow, blue, the green...
it is totally worth coming.
It's absolutely beautiful here in the rainbow mountains
We need to warm up, so we'll
catch you at the bottom of the hill.
You know it. Experience over Possessions .
Kick the Grind. Go out find your own
adventures. See you guys back in a warm
cozy bar with a beer.
